OOC: Group of bots? Uh, but which bot is it heading for?


IC:


MCGOWAN / =
BARRYMORE





(McGowan jumps backwards when showered with bullets. She tak=
es several steps backwards and then fires 2 missiles at Lokk...)



(Barrym=
ore is struck by one of the laser beams in her right shoulder. She bares he=
r teeth and ignores the pain. She sidesteps the other beam, it only made sl=
ight contact to her right arm giving her a small burn. She fires 5 laser be=
ams at Axis...)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 4:20 PM
  Subject: Re: Cl=
ash


  --- Lokk / Axis ---

  Lokk leaps to the side, behind a rock, as Mc=
Gowan's missile 
  smashes into the ground behind him, "Whew..." He reloads=
 his 
  weapons then whips both chain guns over the rock to face 
  McGowan=
, and unloads his clips, spraying the groups with fifty 
  bullets. He guns=
 start to click indicating ammunition depletion. He 
  ducks behind the roc=
k to reload.

  Axis covers his face with his arm as a laser beam sears tha=
t limb. 
  several other lasers streak by him, one smoking him in the knee.=
 
  His charging laser at full power, Axis levels his laser and fires twice=
 
  at Barrymore. His missile launcher follows up with another missile 
  h=
eading into the group of bots.

   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject=
 to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
